content: the only annoying thing is on aws you can match only on aud and sub on AWS, which is fairly limited, but that could be worked around with a lambda that validates the jwt on its own and calls sts:AssumeRole to generate the temporary credentials
(in my experience that's not needed for most of the things, the only place I'd probably do that is rust-lang/rust to restrict each job to push in its commit's path instead of any commit's path)
